name: get-paymentInstruments-id-reveal
description:
Returns the primary account number (PAN) of a payment instrument.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/issuing/manage-access/api-credentials-web-service#api-permissions):

* Balance Platform BCL PCI role

id.description: The unique identifier of the payment instrument.

$ul: **cvc**: The CVC2 value of the card.
**expiration**
**month**: The month in which the card will expire.
**year**: The year in which the card will expire.
**pan**: The primary account number (PAN) of the card.
